settings.square_description: Go To Paris, Wear The Dress, Have The Best Time Of Your Life

settings.heading: Dress Up with Confête
settings.description: From casual to extravagant, let us clothe you in the most beautiful special event dresses imaginable. You’re guaranteed to feel your most gorgeous in our offerings. Don’t forget you get free shipping on orders over $150. Fill your shopping bag and take home a dress for every occasion from Confête. Let’s dress up!

settings.title: DRESSES FOR EVERY OCCASION
settings.dynamic_text: For your bachelorette party, try a plunging neckline and mid-length number for an elegant dinner gathering or a sparkling sequin mini for a night on the town. Our boutique dresses online come in a wide variety of styles to suit practically every aesthetic. Next up is your rehearsal dinner! This special night can be anything from serious and refined to whimsical and romantic. However you celebrate the night before your big day, you’ll find a dress to match with us!

settings.title: DRESSES FOR EVERY OCCASION
